directions.dialogText: Let's do some addition! We have declared a variable called \`fruit\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`apples\` and \`oranges\` using the \`+\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`fruit\` the correct number value by combining \`apples\` and \`oranges\` using the \`+\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`apples\`: contains the number of apples  \`oranges\`: contains the number of oranges

\`+\`: adds numbers together
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`apples + oranges\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`frogs\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`green\` and \`yellow\` using the \`+\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`frogs\` the correct number value by combining \`green\` and \`yellow\` using the \`+\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`green\`: contains the number of green frogs  \`yellow\`: contains the number of yellow frogs

\`+\`: adds numbers together
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`green + yellow\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`doughnuts\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`sprinkles\`, \`chocolate\`, and \`glazed\` using the \`+\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`doughnuts\` the correct number value by combining \`sprinkles\`, \`chocolate\`, and \`glazed\` using the \`+\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`sprinkles\`: contains the number of doughnuts with sprinkles

\`chocolate\`: contains the number of chocolate doughnuts

\`glazed\`: contains the number of glazed doughnuts

\`+\`: adds numbers together
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`sprinkles + chocolate + glazed\`.

directions.dialogText: Now let's try subtraction! We have declared a variable called \`strawberry\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`vanilla\` from \`cones\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`strawberry\` the correct number value by subtracting \`vanilla\` from \`cones\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`vanilla\`: contains the number of vanilla  \`cones\`: contains the number of cones

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`cones - vanilla\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`foxes\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`chickens\` from \`animals\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`foxes\` the correct number value by subtracting \`chickens\` from \`animals\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`chickens\`: contains the number of chickens  \`animals\`: contains the number of animals

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`animals - chickens\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`fruit\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`apples\`, \`limes\`, and \`oranges\` using the \`+\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`doughnuts\` the correct number value by combining \`apples\`, \`limes\`, and \`oranges\` using the \`+\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`apples\`: contains the number of apples

\`limes\`: contains the number of limes doughnuts

\`oranges\`: contains the number of oranges doughnuts

\`+\`: adds numbers together
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`apples + limes + oranges\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`emptyPads\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`yellow\` and \`green\` from \`lillypads\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`emptyPads\` the correct number value by subtracting \`yellow\` and \`green\` from \`lillypads\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`yellow\`: contains the number of yellow frogs

\`green\`: contains the number of green frogs

\`lillypads\`: contains the number of lillypads

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`lillypads - yellow - green\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`chocolate\`. Give it the correct number value by subtracting \`sprinkles\` and \`glazed\` from \`doughnuts\` using the \`-\` sign.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`chocolate\` the correct number value by subtracting \`sprinkles\` and \`glazed\` from \`doughnuts\` using the \`-\` sign.
levels.tools:
\`sprinkles\`: contains the number of doughnuts with sprinkles

\`glazed\`: contains the number of glazed doughnuts

\`doughnuts\`: contains the total number of doughnuts

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`doughnuts - sprinkles - glazed\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`doubles\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`chocolate\` and \`strawberry\` and then subtracting \`singles\`.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`doubles\` the correct number value by adding \`chocolate\` and \`strawberry\` and then subtracting \`singles\`.
levels.tools:
\`chocolate\`: contains the number of cones with chocolate ice cream

\`strawberry\`: contains the number of cones with strawberry ice cream

\`singles\`: contains the number of cones with a single scoop

\`+\`: adds numbers together

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`chocolate + strawberry - singles\`.

directions.dialogText: We have declared a variable called \`ninjas\`. Give it the correct number value by adding \`chickens\` and \`foxes\` and then subtracting \`cowboys\`.

levels.mission: Give the variable \`ninjas\` the correct number value by adding \`chickens\` and \`foxes\` and then subtracting \`cowboys\`.
levels.tools:
\`chickens\`: contains the number of chickens

\`foxes\`: contains the number of foxes

\`cowboys\`: contains the number of cowboys

\`+\`: adds numbers together

\`-\`: subtracts one number from another
levels.tips: After the \`=\` sign and before the \`;\`, type \`chickens + foxes - cowboys\`.
